name: New Colony (naujedach)
description:
Two spaceships fight to colonize a newly discovered planet.
Move around the map to conquer more squares than your enemy before time runs out.

Development team: Maxi Bordon, Enzo,  Juan Castillo, Gabriela Cress
, Diego Gonzales, Elizabeth, Lean Viggiano, Sil, Juan Ignacio Chade.
